ProductInfo.Features:
19" Inch LCD TV with Integrated HDTV (ATSC) Tuner, HDTV Ready (1080p, 720p, & 480p)
Resolution 1440 x 900, Contrast Ratio 1,000:1, Brightness (cd/m2) 400 nit, Viewing Angles (V/H) 160/170, Speaker Audio Output 6Wx2
Convenient Front controls, Conformal coated circuit boards, Reinforced cabinet structure and mounting points, RoHS compliant, Composite Video Input 2 L/R NTSC/PAL Compatible
Dual function wireless remote control included (TV/DVD), VESA 100mm x 100mm mounting pattern, IR repeater allows you to operate JENSEN DVD player with the dual full function wireless remote control (included) with your JENSEN TV
Overall Dimensions (without stand) 20.4"W x 15.2"H x 3"D, Overall Dimensions (with stand) 20.4"W x 17.36"H x 3"D, Weight (Lbs) 20,  runs on 12 Volt DC power so watch it as long as you want while out on the road (AC Adapter included)
ProductInfo.Name: Jensen JE1911RTL 19" LCD TV with Stand, Resolution 1440 x 900, integrated HDTV tuner (1080p, 720p & 480p), 16:9 aspect ratio and high-contrast ratio, 12 Volt DC
